channel.title: LORD PLEASE HELP ME
channel.description:
Okay, I've just purchased Alpha Protocol from Direct2drive.com... I know they blow.. but I've used them in the past without any problems.
After installing the game, it asks me to use my activation key.. but it does not work.. I am getting Error Code: -1912029.
Direct2drive has NO PHONE SUPPORT.. and they seem to be refusing to email me back.
SEGA has NO PHONE SUPPORT.
IGN ENTERTAINMENT has NO PHONE SUPPORT... well I can't get a hold of anyone.
I've posted on the Alpha Protocol Forums and no one has responded, I think its dead.
Online it says there is a patch to download to bypass activation, but it also says that " If purchased from STEAM or Direct2drive the patch is already updated and there is no need to download "... I tried that anyways and then it would simply get a Critical Error within 3 seconds of trying to open the game. I had to reinstall....
I am just PRAYING TO THE LORD that someone on this forums perhaps has purchased this shitty game from this shitty website and had the same shitty problem and might be able to help me.
Please if you have any possible idea as to how to fix this it would be greatly appreciated.

item.description:
Strange that he would join up here just to post this problem.

HEY GUYS, I’M HAVING PROBLEMS WITH AN ELITE MOB IN WORLD OF WARCRAFT…SO I’M GOING TO THE HALF LIFE FORUMS TO ASK FOR HELP.

Thankfully everyone on the BMS forum is tolerant and helpful…so long as you don’t ask “Is BMS dead?”

item.title: LORD PLEASE HELP ME

item.description:
Okay, I’ve just purchased Alpha Protocol from Direct2drive.com… I know they blow… but I’ve used them in the past without any problems.

After installing the game, it asks me to use my activation key… but it does not work… I am getting Error Code: -1912029.

Direct2drive has NO PHONE SUPPORT… and they seem to be refusing to email me back.
